title: Plat 3 Support Main LF Duo

embed.description: Check your Summoner Stats / MMR, Live Spectate and using powerful global LoL Statistics!

body:
Been a support main since season 2 looking for an ADC main to climb with. Looking for an ADC main preferably plat 4+.
I main Janna, Sona, Morgana and Braum but play all the supports.
Having a working microphone would be a great as I prefer to be on teamspeak and build synergy and what not,

Add me in game on Scyther Bot
